mapper.select: SELECT id,`name`,content,status,reason,created_at AS createdAt, finish_at AS finishAt,response FROM mlsql_job WHERE mlsql_user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(createdAt),1,0),createdAt DESC LIMIT 0,100
